messages.content: <video>Who is winning?
Do you mean at the final buzzer or in the middle of the game?
at the final buzzer
China (CHN) is winning 82–80 at the final buzzer.
<video>Who is speaking in the video?
Do you mean the presenter/interviewer segment or the restaurant server at the table?
presenter/interviewer segment
The younger presenter — the man in a dark suit with a black tie standing in front of the glass staircase.
<video>What color of shirt is the woman wearing?
Do you mean the staff or the guest?
the staff
the staff is wearing a black suit.
<video>Who is on the phone?
Do you mean the person on the stairs or the receptionist at the desk?
the man on the stairs
The man standing on the stairs (wearing a cream shirt) is on the phone.
<video>What does she put on the baby?
Are you asking about an item of clothing, or something used as a covering?
A covering.
A blanket.
<video>How is the child riding the bike?
Are you asking about the child's riding when an adult is assisting, or later when the child is riding alone?
When an adult is assisting.
The child is riding with an adult walking alongside, holding onto the bike for support.
<video>How many people are on the ground?
Which instance of people on the ground are you referring to?
The large pile-up viewed from above.
More than 15 cyclists are on the ground.
<video>When does the man start walking?
Are you asking about when he starts walking with the basic leg brace, or with the robotic exoskeleton, or with a cane?
With the basic leg brace.
He is first shown walking with a basic leg brace and assistance from a therapist in the early part of his rehabilitation shown in the video.
<video>Which woman is riding the bike?
Which woman are you referring to?
the one with braces
The woman with braces, wearing a black shirt and red backpack strap, is riding the orange bike while being assisted by a man.
<video>A player fell. Where did it happen?
Which player are you referring to, the one from the Lakers or the Mavericks?
The Lakers player.
Near the basket in the paint area on the left side of the court.
<video>What does '5' refer to?
Are you asking about the countdown, a jersey number, or a score?
The countdown.
It refers to the first number shown in the 'TOP 5' countdown sequence.
<video>What is the player in the pink and green jersey doing?
Which player are you referring to?
The one who just dunked.
He is hanging on the rim.
<video>What was done during the security check?
Are you referring to the action that caused the physical incident?
Yes, what started the confrontation?
The agitated woman slapped the security worker's face.
<video>How is the child balancing?
Are you asking about when the pedals were off or when the pedals were on?
When the pedals were off.
The child balances by using their feet to scoot on the ground.
<video>When did this event take place?
Are you asking about the year it was held, or the general time of day depicted?
The year.
<video>When did the incident happen?
Are you asking about the date the response was recorded, or the exact time the car fire started?
The date the response was recorded.
October 8, 2017
<video>What is the man holding?
Which item is he holding when he is proposing?
The one that looks like a ring.
A small flower.
<video>What color of shirt is the person wearing?
Do you mean the man or the woman?
The man
The man is wearing a black coat.
<video>Who is holding the walking aid?
Are you asking about the person whose hands are on the aid for support, or the person positioning/guiding the aid?
The person whose hands are on the aid for support.
The patient.
<video>What did player 7 do?
Which team's player 7 are you asking about?
the one for Unicaja Malaga
He dribbled the ball, jumped, and performed a dunk.
<video>How many fire trucks are present?
Are you asking about all fire department vehicles or only the large ladder trucks?
All fire department vehicles.
Two.
<video>Who performed the pat-down?
Are you referring to the officer at the start of the video (bald with glasses) or the other officer (with dark hair)?
The officer at the start.
The bald officer wearing glasses.
<video>What is burning?
Are you asking about a vehicle or something else?
A vehicle.
Car #26
<video>Who scored multiple goals?
Which match are you referring to?
The first match, Spain vs. Portugal.
Ronaldo and Costa.
<video>What is the player wearing number 11 doing?
Which player wearing number 11 are you asking about?
The one holding a disc.
They are running with a white disc.
<video>What is handed over?
Are you asking about an object handed over to the presenter or by the presenter to someone else?
By the presenter to someone else.
A golden Oscar award statue.
<video>Which arm is getting injected?
Which person are you asking about?
The woman in the black dress.
She receives the injection in her left arm.
<video>What colored shirt is getting shot?
Are you asking about the woman or the man?
The woman.
A woman with blonde hair and a black top receives the shot.
<video>Who is putting on the shoes?
Are you referring to the person whose shoes are being put on, or the person performing the action?
The person performing the action.
The woman in the pink jacket (the caregiver) is putting on the patient's shoes.
<video>Who is playing the piano?
Are you asking about the person with glasses and a beard, the woman in black, or another person?
The person with glasses and a beard.
The man with glasses and a beard is playing in frame 38.
<video>Where is the baby?
Are you asking in the beginning or end of the video?
At the beginning.
The baby is in her arms.
<video>What was the child doing on the bed?
Was the child actively moving or resting?
Actively moving.
The child was jumping on the bed.
<video>What is burning?
Are you asking about the car fire or the small battery demonstration?
The car fire.
A white Tesla car is burning.
<video>What is the baby eating?
Are you asking about the general type of food, or the specific ingredient shown being fed?
The specific ingredient.
Sweet potato puree.
<video>What was the United States' score?
Which game are you asking about?
The one against Thailand.
<video>What is the color of the shirt that the man is wearing?
Do you mean in the beginning of the video or in the latter frames?
The beginning.
The man is wearing a white shirts.
<video>What is being trimmed?
Are you asking about his head hair or his beard?
His beard
The client's beard is being trimmed.
<video>Who is on the bike?
Are you asking about the one who is learning to ride, or the one demonstrating?
The one demonstrating.
The adult woman is on the bike, demonstrating (seen in frames 5-10).
<video>What is she doing?
Are you asking about the woman receiving the service or the woman performing it?
The woman receiving the service.
She is sitting in a salon chair, receiving a pedicure, and being interviewed.
<video>What did the man in the yellow shirt do?
Are you asking about his interaction with the woman in the green mask?
Yes, the woman in the green mask.
He proposed to her.
<video>What is the player in yellow doing?
Are you asking about their physical action or the outcome of the play?
The outcome of the play.
The player in yellow conceded a goal.
<video>What is the person in the yellow shirt doing?
Which person in the yellow shirt are you referring to?
The one holding the camera.
They are filming.
<video>Who scored a point?
Which player scored their first visible point on the scoreboard in this sequence of frames?
B.EERLAND
B.EERLAND
<video>Who is in the white dress?
Are you asking about the woman accepting the award or the woman presenting it?
The woman accepting the award.
Regina King.
<video>What is the number of the player driving the ball in a dark jersey?
Are you asking about the player who passes after driving, or the one who takes a shot?
The one who takes a shot
<video>Where is the music?
Are you referring to the sheet music or the sound?
The sheet music.
There is sheet music on both grand pianos.
<video>Who is speaking?
Are you referring to the person holding the golden award, or the person in the white dress?
The person holding the golden award.
A man is speaking.
<video>What is the long black object seen with the characters used for?
Are you asking about its function as a security device?
Yes, as a security device.
It is used by the security guard to scan people for prohibited items.
<video>Who is helping the baby on the motorcycle?
Which man are you asking about?
The man with the purple jacket
He is kneeling or standing next to the baby on the motorcycle.
<video>What is presented to the customer last?
Are you asking about a food item or a transaction-related item?
transaction-related item
The change and receipt.
<video>What fast food feature is being adopted?
Are you asking about physical technology in the drive-thru lane?
Yes.
Digital menu boards are being adopted (e.g., seen at McDonald's in frames 21, 27, 29, 31, 32, and KFC in frames 57, 61; also quantified in the chart in frame 33).
<video>What is toast?
Do you mean the food item or the celebratory act?
the food item
Burnt bread that pops out of a toaster.
<video>What was the result?
Are you asking about the outcome for the person who resisted the police?
Yes, the one who tried to run.
His blood alcohol content was 117 milligrams per 100 milliliters. He was sentenced to 1 month detention, 2 months probation, and a fine of 10,000 RMB.
<video>What color is the cream being applied to the person's leg?
Are you asking about the woman or the man?
The woman.
It is yellow.
<video>How many trucks are visible?
Are you referring to the fire trucks or other types of trucks (e.g., delivery trucks)?
Other types of trucks.
<video>Who made the basket?
Are you asking about the dunk labeled in the video?
Yes, the dunk.
Wade Baldwin
<video>What is the score shown?
Which game's score are you asking about?
The one where player #4 is playing.
BAL 13, ORA 11
<video>What is the woman in the floral shirt doing on the bike?
Are you asking about when her feet are on the ground or on the pedals?
Her feet are on the ground.
She is scooting forward by pushing off the ground with her feet.
<video>What is the score?
Which game's score are you interested in?
The final score where Miami won.
Miami 74, N. Illinois 71.
<video>What is the player in blue doing?
Are you asking about the player near the basket, wearing number 3?
Yes, that's the one.
The player is attempting a dunk.
<video>What is the bearded man doing?
Which activity are you referring to?
The one where he is holding a large silver award.
He is holding a silver YouTube Play Button award.
<video>What was the yellow player doing?
Were you asking about his interaction with the ball or with the red player?
His interaction with the red player.
He made contact with the red player's (16) leg after kicking the ball, causing the red player to fall inside the penalty area.
<video>What is the nurse doing with the tubes?
Which tube are you referring to?
The one she is inverting.
She is inverting and mixing the first blood collection tube.
<video>Who ran onto the field?
Are you asking about the person in the black swimsuit or the person in the yellow costume?
The person in the black swimsuit.
A woman in a black swimsuit with 'Vitaly Uncensored' written on it.
<video>What is the procedure about?
Are you asking about the general subject of the video, or the specific substance being administered?
The specific substance.
Testosterone.
<video>What did he just receive?
Are you referring to an object or a gesture?
An object.
An Oscar award statuette.
<video>What did people do on the mistletoe cam?
Are you asking about marriage proposals or kisses?
Marriage proposals.
Proposed marriage.
<video>Who is wearing the gold watch?
Are you asking about the person washing the hair or the person getting their hair washed?
The person washing the hair.
The person washing the hair is wearing a gold watch on their left wrist.
<video>What is the player in the green jersey doing?
When are you referring to?
At the end of the first quarter.
He is player #11, shooting the ball.
<video>Who is holding the baby?
Are you asking about a doll or a real baby?
A real baby.
A doctor is holding a real baby in several scenes, examining it.
<video>What is the firefighter spraying?
Are you referring to the firefighter spraying water outside or the one spraying fire inside?
The one spraying water outside.
He is spraying water onto a building wall.
<video>When does a player use a crutch?
Are you asking for the clip number, or the exact time in the video?
The clip number.
Clip number 4.
<video>What is the current point score in the table tennis game?
Which game are you referring to?
The one where a player falls.
NGR 10, IND 5 (in Game 4).
<video>When did the rider fall?
Which rider are you referring to?
The one in the blue and black outfit, tumbling down the dirt slope.
<video>Who received the red card?
Are you asking about the player visible in the red jersey receiving the card, or the player named in the subtitle?
The player named in the subtitle.
Shao Jiayi
<video>What is happening at the free throw line?
Are you asking about a player shooting a free throw?
Yes, a player shooting a free throw.
In frame 16, a player in white jersey number 10 is shooting a free throw.
<video>What is the person wearing on their wrist?
Which person are you referring to?
The one washing the hair.
Multiple silver bracelets.
<video>What happened to the individuals who were lost?
Are you asking about their survival?
Yes, if they survived.
No, they did not survive; the two firefighters, Xie Zhiyong and Zhang Zhejia, died in the fire.
<video>When is the hair wet?
Are you asking about during the wash or during the styling process?
During the wash.
The hair is wet from approximately 0:05 when it's at the shampoo bowl until around 0:26 after the final rinse.
<video>Who is celebrating?
Are you asking about the player seen celebrating the most goals?
Yes, the player seen celebrating the most goals.
Ronaldo.
<video>What is the woman wearing?
Which woman are you referring to?
The one speaking into the microphone.
She is wearing a light brown top with a dark, possibly fur, collar or scarf.
<video>When does a bike fall?
Are you asking about a bicycle tipping over or being dropped, or a person falling off a bike during an incident?
A person falling off a bike during an incident.
<video>What is being removed?
Are you asking about shoes or items from pockets?
Shoes
A passenger is removing a brown boot at the airport security checkpoint.
<video>What is the woman wearing?
Which woman are you asking about? The one in the black dress or another?
The one in the black dress.
She is wearing a long, black, sparkling dress.
<video>Who is asking for HW?
Are you referring to the person visible in the frames or the brand symbol?
The brand symbol.
Ferrari
<video>How many 'best dunks' are there?
Are you asking about the literal text 'Best Dunks' or the individual dunk plays?
the individual dunk plays
There are at least 50 individual dunk plays shown in the video.
<video>What are they doing?
Which group are you asking about?
The ones making sparks
Firefighters are using a power saw to cut into a metal door or wall, creating sparks.
<video>What is player 47 doing?
Which team's player 47 are you asking about?
The player in the red jersey.
In frames 56-60, he is dribbling the ball and then takes a shot.
<video>What recommendations did the waiter give?
Are you asking about the initial general recommendations, or the recommendations given after the customers clarified their preferences?
After the customers clarified their preferences.
The waiter recommended Stir-fried Wild River Shrimps, Pan-fried Wagyu beef, Cordyceps flower abalone soup, and Stir-fried broccoli.
<video>What color are the uniforms?
Which country do you mean?
China
The field players wear red uniforms, and the goalkeeper wears a dark blue one.
<video>Where is the baby lying?
When are you mean, at the beginning, middle or end of the video?
In the middle of the video
In the middle of the video, te baby is lying on the bed.
<video>What color are the cones?
The cones are in various colors. When do you mean?
At the end of the video.
At the end of the video, blue and yellow cones are visible.
<video>What is the person wearing gloves holding?
There are several scenes with people wearing gloves. Could you specify when you mean?
The scene where the gloved person is holding an item near the “Not Taking Out All Your Liquids” caption.
The person is holding a water bottle.
<video>What is the gender of the person speaking into the microphone?
There are two people speaking into microphone. Can you clarify?
I mean the presenter.
The presenter is male.
<video>What color is the man wearing?
There are many players in the video — could you clarify which one you mean?
The guy wearing number 0 who appears at the end of the video.
He’s wearing a white shirt and black pants.
<video>What color is the helmet of the rider on the road?
Which rider do you mean?
The one who fell down at the end.
The helmet is yellow.
<video>What color is the shirt the man wearing?
There are two men in the video. Can you specify which one you mean?
The one who pushed the bike first.
He is wearing a dark blue shirt.
<video>What color are the nails?
Do you mean before or after?
After.
Based on the additional information, the toenail color is red.
<video>Who is nearer the net?
Do you mean the player in red or the player in blue?
blue
The player in blue is nearer the net.
<video>Who is blowing into the breath-testing device?
Do you mean the man in the sleeveless shirt or the helmeted woman?
the man in the sleeveless shirt
The man in the sleeveless shirt is blowing into the breath-testing device.
<video>Who is wearing a leather jacket?
Do you mean in the red-carpet entrance shots or during the seated interview on stage?
in the red-carpet entrance
The curly-haired man in the leather jacket (walking with the group on the red carpet).
<video>Is the woman wearing slippers?
Do you mean while she's still in bed or after she stands?
after she stands
Yes — after she stands she is wearing slippers.
<video>Is she holding a bottle in the salon?
There are two women in the video, which one do you mean?
The woman who is recording the video.
No, she was holding the bottle in the car. In the salon, only the woman applying the nail polish is holding the bottle.
<video>Who is winning?
Do you mean in the first frame or the last frame?
last frame
Dallas (DAL) is leading 114–108.
<video>Who dunked?
Which dunk do you mean — the Brooklyn play at 4:28 or the earlier Atlanta dunk?
Brooklyn at 4:28
Brooklyn player #8.
<video>What is the person holding?
Who do you mean?
The woman who is wearing the pink shirt.
She is holding a dog.
<video>What should be shaken 20 times?
Do you mean the insulin or the pen device?
the insulin
The mix-type insulin (gently shake 20 times before injection).
<video>Who is dribbling the ball?
Do you mean the player with '362' on his back or the player with '421'?
the player with 362
The player wearing 362.
<video>Who slapped the airport worker in the video?
Do you mean the person by the metal detector on the left or the woman at the conveyor?
person by metal detector (left)
The person by the metal detector on the left (a woman wearing black) slapped the worker.
<video>What color is the mask worn by the person being vaccinated?
Do you mean the woman or the man shown later?
The woman who got vaccinated first.
She is wearing a dark blue mask with a floral pattern.
<video>What is the number of the player who dunks?
There are many players dunking since these are the best dunks, which one do you mean?
The player wearing the green uniform.
His number is 1.
<video>Was the child scooting or pedaling in the video?
Do you mean before or after the pedals were put back on?
before pedals reattached
They were scooting (using their feet to push).
<video>Which country is playing against the Chinese player?
There are multiple players competing against the Chinese player — can you specify when you mean?
In the first clip.
The player is from Japan.
<video>What are they doing?
When do you mean?
After they stop the car.
The firefighters are extinguishing the burning car with hoses.
<video>Where is the wheelchair positioned?
Do you mean relative to the patient's body?
Yes, before the patient sits in the wheelchair.
It’s positioned on the patient’s left side from the nurse’s point of view.
<video>Who is holding the ring?
Do you mean before or after they hug?
Before.
The man in the white shirt, who is kneeling, is holding and presenting the ring.
<video>What is he eating?
Do you mean when he parks his car or while he’s driving?
When he stopped his car.
He is eating a chicken burger.
<video>When number 10 scores, which country is the USA playing against?
Do you mean the first or the second one?
The First one.
It is China.
<video>What color is the car in the background?
Do you mean the car behind the woman or the man?
The car behind the woman when they parked their car.
It is a red car.
<video>Who is leading in the game?
Which clip do you mean?
The thrid one.
Virtus Bologna is leading 28-26.
<video>What color are the letters written on the car?
Which letters do you mean?
The letters on the front of the fire truck.
The word “FEUERWEHR” is written in white.
<video>Which team celebrated after the goal?
All the teams celebrated, but I can answer if you provide more details.
The team wearing blue uniforms.
It is UCLA.
<video>What is the person who got vaccinated wearing?
Do you mean the man who was vaccinated first or the seated woman?
The man.
He is wearing a suit.
<video>Is the car on fire?
Which car do you mean?
The oragne car at the end.
Yes — the orange Indy car is on fire.
<video>Who points at the sheet music?
Do you mean the man in the suit or the man in the green jacket?
the man in the suit
The man in the suit points at the sheet music.
<video>Is he wearing a watch?
Do you mean the man applying the syringe or the man who got the injection?
The one applying it.
No, he is not.
<video>Is he wearing a helmet?
Do you mean the guy riding the bike or the one filming the video?
The one recording the video.
No, he is not.
<video>Who is pouring the drink?
Do you mean the man wearing black or the man wearing blue?
man in black
The man in black is pouring the drink.
<video>Did a player dive for the disc?
Do you mean early or late in the video?
early
Yes — early in the video a player in a yellow jersey dives horizontally to reach the disc.
<video>How many people are on the stage?
Do you mean before or after the announcement?
After the announcement.
There are two people, one is the presenter, and the other is the award winner.
<video>How many people are shown in the video?
When do you mean?
When the Black man recives the vaccine.
Two people are shown, one is the woman giving the injection, and the other one is the Black man you mentioned.
<video>Who is winning?
Which scoreboard do you mean — the top-left frame?
Top-left frame
Hawks are winning 30 to 21.
<video>Is the woman wearing glasses?
There are two women, which one do you mean?
I mean the nurse giving the vaccine.
Yes, she is wearing black glasses
<video>What brand are the socks the woman is wearing?
Who do you mean?
The woman wearing the pink jacket.
The brand is not visible.
<video>What color is the dress the woman is wearing?
Who do you mean?
The woman speaking on the stage as the award winner.
Her dress is chapagne or pale gold.
<video>Who won the shootout?
Which shootout do you mean — the one showing 'SEA 1 1 STAN' near the end?
SEA vs STAN
Stanford
